languages.text: "Я поступил{mf||а} с твоими собратьями так, как они того заслуживали".
"I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."
languages.original_text: "Я поступил{mf||а} с твоими собратьями так, как они того заслуживали".

traits.locale_text: "I had treated your kinsmen the way they deserved."
"I had treated your kinsmen the way they deserved."
"I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."
"I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."
"I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."

languages.text: “我没有做错，你的族人都是罪有应得。”
languages.original_text: "I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."

traits.locale_text: “我没有做错，你的族人都是罪有应得。”

languages.text: «No lamento mis actos. Tu gente no recibió más que su merecido».
languages.original_text: "I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."

traits.locale_text: «No lamento mis actos. Tu gente no recibió más que su merecido».

languages.text: « J'assume mes actions. Vos semblables ont reçu le traitement qu'ils méritaient. »
languages.original_text: "I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."

traits.locale_text: « J'assume mes actions. Vos semblables ont reçu le traitement qu'ils méritaient. »

languages.text: "Ich stehe zu meinem Handeln. Die Euren haben nur bekommen, was sie verdient haben."
languages.original_text: "I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stehe zu meinem Handeln. Die Euren haben nur bekommen, was sie verdient haben."

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は自分の行動を貫く。お前の同族は当然の報いを受けただけだ」
languages.original_text: "I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は自分の行動を貫く。お前の同族は当然の報いを受けただけだ」

languages.original_text: "I stand by my actions. Your kin got nothing less than what they deserved."

traits.locale_text: "Yaptıklarımın arkasındayım. Senin soyun hak ettiğini aldı."
